cardtext: Just a very simple card with a title and some text.
It can be /styled/ using simple *mark-up* in the spreadsheet.
Needs a third card here to fill out the row. Could not think of anything fun to say just filling out with more text.

column4: Card with rabbit image. There is actually room for a lot more text here
column5: just had nothing more to say on these.

column7: There is room for multiple lines of text here.

column13: Not really the best icons to show off a card like this.
Running out of ideas, so this is more or less a copy of the previous card. Also I have no idea what the numbers in the bottom-right corner are for.

cardtitle: This template is just a card with text. It is pretty boring. At most you can add some /simple/ *style* to the text. But perhaps for a very early prototype this is sometimes all that is needed? There is room for a lot of text here. Too much text. Do not know what to do with all this space.
Making two copies of this card (by putting a 2 in the first cell of the row in the spreadsheet).
